name: Arctic Cat Turbo F1100: Muffler Exhaust By-Pass/Silent Choice - Series 2 UPDATED DESIGN
description:
SERIES 2: UPDATED DESIGN

Do you want serious straight pipe flow but to be capable to have a choice to be as quiet as stock?

This stainless steel system exits through stock hole in belly pan with a 3" straight pipe that flows crazy numbers and also a stock quiet muffler at a press of a button on the dash. This 3" pipe will support 300+ hp in open mode and 235 hp in quiet mode.

Offered with V-band to work with our extreme 3" Divorce Pipe for extreme power.

2.5" is $799 CAN

name: Arctic Cat Turbo F1100: Divorce Pipe Extreme 3 inches
description: Drastically increases flow compared to a restrictive stock outlet by reducing turbulence by increasing the pipe diameter to extreme 3inches, straightening the flow from the turbo charger by isolating blow off exhaust flow and turbine exhaust flow. This pipe will increase HP by 7-8hp on stock machine. Want To GAIN 25HP on a stock programmed machine??!! Install XYZ High Flow Muffler+ Divorce Pipe + Aluminum Charge tubes= 25++ HP on stock ecu

name: Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo Exhaust By Pass
description: The XYZ Performance Exhaust By-Pass Series II kit for Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo snowmobiles enables the rider to use stock OEM exhaust can for trail use with the ability of 'a flick of a switch' to a straight down pipe dumping out under the belly pan of the sled. This series will give more clearance and less exhaust turbulence. This is a must and the BEST set up for high hp sleds in OEM muffler restricted areas. Cruise trails into town through stock muffler, then push the switch when you hit the lake or back country and you are straight exhaust enabling you to run high hp numbers. Check out this video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VTDWA0Xyp3c on YouTube to see it in action. The Exhaust By-Pass kit includes: - Series II one pc design - Marine grade led switch - Wiring and pipe

name: Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo: Methanol Injection Kit
description: The XYZ Performance Methanol Injection Kit is a must to be able to run an Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo at high horse power (HP) settings on 91 octane pump gas. **Electronic Controller not included The main function of water methanol injection is preventing detonation. Detonation is caused by high temperatures and pressure developed in the combustion chamber. A mixture of 50/50% of methanol and water is ideal, wind-shield washer fluid is the most widely used product being inexpensive and easy to obtain. In testing we have seen 350 HP on 93 octane pump gas with no detonation. Using a 250 psi high pressure pump gives better atomization and less consumption of methanol. Industry standard is 150 psi. Kit One Includes: • Custom Aluminum Tank • 250 psi pump • All wiring, fittings, tubing and brackets • 3 BAR MAP sensor adjustable from 1-25 Ibs

name: Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo: Race Muffler
description: The XYZ Performance Race Muffler is a glass pack design for Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo snowmobiles.

name: Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo: Methanol Injection Kit Includes Electronic Controller
description: The XYZ Performance Methanol Injection with Electronic Controller is a must to be able to run an Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo at high horse power (HP) settings on 91 octane pump gas. The main function of water methanol injection is preventing detonation. Detonation is caused by high temperatures and pressure developed in the combustion chamber. A mixture of 50/50% of methanol and water is ideal, wind-shield washer fluid is the most widely used product being inexpensive and easy to obtain. In testing we have seen 350 HP on 93 octane pump gas with no detonation. Using a 250 psi high pressure pump gives better atomization and less consumption of methanol. Industry standard is 150 psi. The Electronic Controller that will let you set your start and ending point for injection. This controller will enable the rider to fine tune injection, greatly reducing consumption and efficiency. Controller is in an extruded aluminium case and is weather resistant. Kit Two Includes: • Custom Aluminum Tank • 250 psi pump • All wiring, fittings, tubing and brackets • 3 BAR MAP sensor adjustable from 1-25 Ibs • Electronic Controller

name: Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo: Fan Kit Intercooler
description:
• 700 CFM fan with switch attaches to intercooler 
• Reduces air charge temperature dramatically and increases dense air  charge for more HP.
• Also reduces under hood temperatures

name: Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo: Upper Charge Pipe
description:
XYZ Performance Upper Charge Pipe is a must for high Horsepower (HP) settings on Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo snowmobiles.
• Full 2.5 inch pipe replaces the 'bottle neck' restricted 1.75 inch stock pipe.
• Bungs installed for methanol injection and MAP/boost gage sensors.
• 2-8 HP gain depending on boost settings.

name: Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo: Intercooler
description:
The XYZ Performance Intercooler for Arctic Cat Z1 Turbo is 4” thick with more area than the stock intercooler for lower intake air temperatures and more Horsepower (HP), comes with 2.5 inch piping kit to replace the stock rubber piping for better flow.
• Capable of 450 HP, less than 0.1 psi drop at 30 psi.
• Pressure tested 80 psi.
• Will enable to run lower octane fuel at high boost settings.
• 5-20 HP gain at different boost settings.
• 100% aluminum, hand welded.
• Polished charge tubes included.
• Customers have stated that with stock muffler and using a HiJacker they where able to run 5 to 10 HP before detonation on same octane fuel.
• Piping couplers available in Red, Blue and Black please request a colour (please note colours will depend availability)

name: Arctic Cat Turbo F1100: Oversize Charge Tubes
description: • 2.5 inch Aluminum Charge Tubes • Increased tube diameter • Huge flow gains, better heat dissipation • Do not expand like stock hoses resulting in better throttle response Install XYZ High Flow Muffler+ Divorce Pipe + Aluminium Charge tubes= 25++ HP on stock ecu

name: Arctic Cat Turbo F1100: Highflow Intercooler
description:
• Increase cooling capacity by 66% compared to stock
• Drastically Increases flow volume and reduce back pressure compared to stock
• Reduces probability of detonation.
• Huge 2.5 inlet and outlet - 2.5 inch polished charge tubes included.
• Fits stock location with minor modifications.

name: Arctic Cat Turbo F1100: High Flow Quiet Trail Muffler
description: • All stainless steel construction with 2.5 inch inlet and outlet. • A little louder than stock with a slight deep tune. • Save 11 lbs compared to stock • Perfect all round muffler Install XYZ High Flow Muffler+ Divorce Pipe + Aluminum Charge tubes= 25++ HP on stock ecu

name: Arctic Cat Turbo F1100: Methanol Injection Kit
description: The XYZ Performance Methanol Injection with Electronic Controller is a must to be able to run an Arctic Cat F1100 at high horse power (HP) settings on 91 octane pump gas. • The main function of water methanol injection is preventing detonation. Detonation is caused by high temperatures and pressure developed in the combustion chamber. • A mixture of 50/50% of methanol and water is ideal, wind-shield washer fluid is the most widely used product being inexpensive and easy to obtain. • In testing we have seen 350 HP on 93 octane pump gas with no detonation. • Using a 250 psi high pressure pump gives better atomization and less consumption of methanol. Industry standard is 150 psi. • The Electronic Controller that will let you set your start and ending point for injection. • This system is not an on/off system, a processor calculates and adjusts amount of meth volume/pressure per lbs of boost. Simply put, more boost more meth, and they can be adjusted to fuel grade. • This controller will enable the rider to fine tune injection, greatly reducing consumption and efficiency. This kit Includes: • Custom Aluminum Tank • 250 psi pump pre set at 200psi • All wiring, fittings, tubing and brackets. • Electronic Controller

name: Arctic Cat Turbo F1100: Divorce Pipe 2.5 inches
description: Drastically increases flow compared to a restrictive stock outlet by reducing turbulence by increasing the pipe diameter to 2.5 inches, straightening the flow from the turbo charger by isolating blow off exhaust flow and turbine exhaust flow. This pipe will increase HP by 7-8hp on stock machine. Want To GAIN 25HP on a stock programmed machine??!! Install XYZ High Flow Muffler+ Divorce Pipe + Aluminum Charge tubes= 25++ HP on stock ecu
